meanings.definition: A plant of the mint family with aromatic leaves, often grown for its attractiveness to cats.
meanings.sent1: The catmints in the garden swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: Many people plant catmints to make their yard more appealing to feline friends.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat rolled around in the catmints, looking quite content.
meanings.sent4: The scent of the catmints filled the air, drawing in curious cats from all around.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant purple flowers of the catmints added a pop of color to the garden.

meanings.definition: The dried leaves of the catmint plant, used in herbal medicine or as a cat attractant.
meanings.sent1: She brewed a soothing tea using catmints to help with her cold.
meanings.sent2: Pet owners sprinkle catmints on toys to entice their cats to play.
meanings.sent3: The cat mistook the bag of catmints for treats and pawed at it eagerly.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the catmints filled the room, calming both the cat and its owner.
meanings.sent5: The herbalist carefully dried the catmints to preserve their healing properties.
